title: Game crashing
body: This isn't the first time it's happened. Twice it's happened, my game crashed as it was loading. I'm already getting tired of it already.

replies.body: Sorry about the instability you're having. :/ Were you able to generate a crash dump during one of your crashes? Those will help a lot in identifying what's going wrong.
I've had trouble doing so in mine; game freezes in such a way that I can't access that screen (at least not with my limited IT knowledge). Always have to force quit.
Are you running in fullscreen mode? If so, this may be why you get locked up and can't access your desktop without force quitting, making it impossible to access the crash dump prompt.

It's pretty bad. I'm playing Fullscreen as well, but I've never had a game lock up my computer like this. 

You legitimately have to turn off the session to even be able to get off the black screen or the screen you froze on.
Hey! Are you freezing before the loading screen pops up, during the loading screen, or at some point in game?

I've personally experienced 2 crashes ; the first time was during Loading screen, I noticed the game just didn't pop-up after exiting champion selection. I managed to get back to the reconnect screen, which I clicked at that point I was locked for a good 10-15 minutes straight staring at a black screen trying to access something to close the game down (including trying to have a dumpfile).

The second time was after the game had just ended. I got stuck on the exploded nexus and couldn't exist the same way it happened during the loading screen; my 3 friends who were playing with me though had no problem.
Thanks for the details! Definitely helps us narrow down what crashes are related and where to investigate.
My game crashes loading TFT every other game. Literally. It completely locks my computer and u have to reboot it and reload go get it to work.

For clarity, we aren't suspecting that fullscreen is the reason you're crashing, but rather that being fullscreen keeps you from being able to access the crash dump prompt because the game locks your screen up.
As an additional question, how consistently are you encountering this crash?

I have had 2 crashes in about... 6 games or so? One of them was SR and the other was TFT. 

And yes, I am running fullscreen :( maybe I shouldn't until this problem gets sorted out.

Very consistent crashes. In fact, I just had one, but this time I couldn't open the window to generate a crash dump. Every other time I've generated one. I've tried restarting my computer every time, yet it keeps occurring. I don't have AVAST Antivirus and I'm starting to think a system error isn't the problem. Thankfully I had some understanding teammates this last time.
Been getting a critical error after champ select since the hotfix this afternoon. Halp :/. Not sure what to do with the .tmp file the error generates.

Okay i have a temporary fix for you all. I also have crashes where when the game start it would experience an critcial error and crash. What fixes it for me was when i uninstalled a windows update. yes for some reason a windows update causes the game to crash but it was only league of legends when starting a game. so it doesnt affect other games. Please also note that the computer i am using has a Ryzen 1600 cpu. Why is this important? well because i also have a gaming laptop from msi with an intel cpu which is also up to date windows. this laptop does not experience these crashes. idk about anyone else but this seems to show that the problem is the fault of riot or microsoft. please note that this is a temporary fix, as your computer will try to download the problomatic update without your consent and you will found yourself unable to play your match because of the crashes. there are ways to prevent windows from updating the specific  update. please note that its a specific update and you may have to unistall an update and see which one is causing the crashes. also note that not all new update will cause crashes as a newer update may not cause any issues as like an older one.
go to update history and then go to uninstall update to uninstall specific updates. for me rn the problamatic update which causes my game to crash is Update for microsoft windows KB4530684
